abstract.description: Software to extract the data for the browser-based event display for the CMS Experiment

links.description: More information on the format can be found at

methodology.description: The software produces the objects to be displayed. The configuration file https://github.com/cms-outreach/ispy-analyzers/blob/Run2010B/python/ISpy_AOD_Producer_cff.py defines the objects to write out, which is done in the corresponding cc files in the src directory. No event selection, apart from accepting only the validated runs, is applied.

relations.description: The output are files in json format such as

system_details.description: Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment

title: Software to extract the event display format from the CMS primary dataset

use_with.description: Use this with any of the CMS primary datasets

validation.description: Only the list of validated runs are accepted:

abstract.description: A browser-based event display for the CMS Experiment using WebGL

system_details.description: The application is written using JavaScript, HTML and CSS. It reads a JSON event format and uses the JavaScript WebGL API three.js.

use_with.description: Use this with derived data in event display format
